tech_news.title: EA will skip next year’s F1 game and release update DLC instead - The Verge
tech_news.description: EA is planning to release a downloadable paid expansion update for F1 25 instead of releasing a full new game next year, with a “full” refreshed experience coming in 2027.

tech_news.title: Megabonk Developer Withdraws Game From The Game Awards, Saying It Doesn't Qualify for Debut Indie - IGN
tech_news.description: Vedinad, developer of Megabonk, has withdrawn his game from The Game Awards following its nomination for Best Debut Indie Game, saying it doesn't qualify for the category.
